acme.util.option

Class Option<T>

  • java.lang.Object
    • acme.util.option.Option<T>
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    CommandLineOption

    public class Option<T>
extends java.lang.Object
    A configuration option. These will be logged in the XML produced during execution, so it is useful to keep all config options in them, so that there is a history of how a program was run.
